snippet.title: Valfaris trailer - PC Gaming Show 2019
snippet.description:
Digital Uppercut and Steel Mantis bring us a "heavy metal infused 2D action-platformer." Pulling inspiration from games like Contra and Turrican.

You can read more here: https://www.pcgamer.com/action-platformer-valfaris-gets-a-heavy-metal-trailer-at-the-pc-gaming-show/
